com.authlete.cbor

Class CBORBoolean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.authlete.cbor.CBORItem
      • com.authlete.cbor.CBORValue<Boolean>
        • com.authlete.cbor.CBORBoolean

  • public class CBORBoolean
extends CBORValue<Boolean>
    CBOR boolean (major type = 7, additional information = 20 or 21).

    The CBORValue.getValue() method of this class returns either Boolean.FALSE or Boolean.TRUE.

    See Also:
    RFC 8949, 3.3. Floating-Point Numbers and Values with No Content

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static CBORBoolean FALSE
      CBOR false (major type = 7, additional information = 20).
      static CBORBoolean TRUE
      CBOR true (major type = 7, additional information = 21).
